title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern and responsive portfolio website built with React. Features include dark/light theme, smooth animations, and a contact form.

title: Task Master Pro
description: The project is a Todo App, which likely allows users to manage tasks by adding, filtering, and marking them as complete or incomplete. It is structured as a modern web application with reusable components and a focus on modularity.

title: Anime Watchlist
description: Anime Watchlist is a responsive web and Android application that helps users track, rate, and organize anime. Users can add series to their collection, assign ratings on a 0-10 scale, organize anime into tier rankings, and track their watch status. The app features both light and dark themes, and stores data locally with an optimized Android version that significantly reduces app size.

title: E-Commerce Website
description: A fully responsive e-commerce platform built with React and Node.js. Features include user authentication, product filtering, cart functionality, and payment processing.

title: Travel Blog API
description: A RESTful API for a travel blog application. Features include user authentication, CRUD operations for blog posts, and image upload management.

title: Recipe Finder
description: An application that helps users find recipes based on ingredients they have. Features include filtering by dietary restrictions, saving favorites, and meal planning.

title: Chat Application
description: Real-time chat application with private messaging, group chats, and file sharing capabilities.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather application that displays current conditions and forecasts for any location. Includes interactive maps, charts for historical data, and severe weather alerts.
